title: Special gas distribution in Colombo, Kalutara, Gampaha today
body_lines: LITRO Gas Lanka Ltd has announced that a special domestic gas distribution plan for Colombo, Kalutara, and Gampaha today.
Gas cylinders weighing 12.5 kg, 5 kg and 2.3 kg will be distributed in the said areas. The gas cylinders will be available for customers in the afternoon, the company said.

Accordingly,16,987 gas cylinders will be distributed among 159 selected dealers. The company added that 14,977 gas cylinders weighing 12.5 kg, 1005  cylinders weighing 5kg and 1005 cylinders weighing 2.3 kg will be distributed among the selected dealers.
The list of dealers who have stock is updated on www.litrogas.com. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
